name: Second Amendment Dodgeball
description:
A two player game of dodgeball - with shotguns!

Face off against a friend in a high school gymnasium. This game is like gym class in hell!

Shoot the dodgeballs with your shotgun to make them hit your opponent. Every minute introduces a new ball.

Collect powerups to increase your speed, give you more firepower or turn your opponent into a sitting duck by nailing him to the floor with bubblegum!

          

Important:

  • This game is 2-player only.
  • This game requires 2 gamepads (XBox or equivalent).
